statements: SELECT * FROM campaign_supporters;
SELECT supporter_name, email FROM campaign_supporters WHERE engagement_level > 5;
SELECT supporter_id, supporter_name FROM campaign_supporters ORDER BY supporter_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM campaign_supporters WHERE engagement_level BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT supporter_name, phone_number FROM campaign_supporters WHERE email IN ('example1@example.com', 'example2@example.com');
SELECT supporter_name, email, engagement_level FROM campaign_supporters WHERE supporter_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY engagement_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaign_supporters WHERE engagement_level > 3 ORDER BY supporter_name ASC;
SELECT supporter_name, phone_number FROM campaign_supporters WHERE supporter_name = 'Alice' OR supporter_name = 'Bob';
SELECT email, supporter_name FROM campaign_supporters ORDER BY supporter_id DESC, engagement_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM campaign_supporters WHERE engagement_level BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY engagement_level ASC, email DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaign_supporters;
SELECT supporter_name, email FROM campaign_supporters;
SELECT supporter_id, email, phone_number FROM campaign_supporters ORDER BY supporter_id DESC;
SELECT supporter_name, engagement_level FROM campaign_supporters WHERE engagement_level > 3;
SELECT engagement_id, date, interaction_type, interaction_details FROM campaign_engagement;
SELECT supporter_name, email FROM campaign_supporters WHERE engagement_level > 2 ORDER BY supporter_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM campaign_supporters WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY supporter_id DESC;
SELECT supporter_id, engagement_id, date FROM campaign_supporters JOIN campaign_engagement ON campaign_supporters.supporter_id = campaign_engagement.supporter_id WHERE supporter_id < 100;
SELECT * FROM campaign_supporters WHERE supporter_name LIKE 'J%' OR supporter_name LIKE 'K%' ORDER BY supporter_name;

SELECT supporter_name, interaction_type, date FROM campaign_supporters JOIN campaign_engagement ON campaign_supporters.supporter_id = campaign_engagement.supporter_id WHERE interaction_type = 'Email' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM supporters;
SELECT supporter_name, email FROM supporters WHERE supporter_id=1;
SELECT supporter_name, phone_number FROM supporters ORDER BY supporter_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM engagement_levels WHERE description LIKE '%engagement%';

SELECT supporter_name, level_name FROM supporters, engagement_levels, supporter_engagement WHERE supporters.supporter_id = supporter_engagement.supporter_id AND engagement_levels.level_id = supporter_engagement.level_id;
SELECT * FROM supporters WHERE supporter_id = 1;
SELECT supporter_name, email FROM supporters WHERE supporter_id > 5 ORDER BY supporter_name DESC;

SELECT supporter_name, level_name, engagement_date FROM supporters JOIN supporter_engagement ON supporters.supporter_id = supporter_engagement.supporter_id JOIN engagement_levels ON supporter_engagement.level_id = engagement_levels.level_id WHERE level_id = 3 ORDER BY engagement_date ASC;
SELECT supporter_id, supporter_name, email FROM supporters WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL AND email LIKE '%gmail.com%';

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_supporters, level_name FROM engagement_levels JOIN supporter_engagement ON engagement_levels.level_id = supporter_engagement.level_id GROUP BY level_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY total_supporters DESC;
SELECT * FROM CampaignSupporters;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM CampaignSupporters ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT supporter_id, engagement_level FROM CampaignSupporters WHERE engagement_level > 3;
SELECT * FROM CampaignAddresses WHERE city='New York';
SELECT supporter_id, donation_date, amount FROM CampaignDonations ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CampaignSupporters WHERE supporter_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM CampaignSupporters ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT supporter_id, engagement_level FROM CampaignSupporters WHERE engagement_level > 3 ORDER BY engagement_level ASC;
SELECT COUNT(supporter_id) AS total_supporters FROM CampaignSupporters;
SELECT * FROM CampaignAddresses WHERE state = 'NY' AND city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM supporters;
SELECT supporter_name, email_address FROM supporters WHERE engagement_level > 3 ORDER BY supporter_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, campaign_description FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_date FROM interactions WHERE supporter_id = 123 ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE campaign_id = 456 AND donation_amount > 100 ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT supporter_name, email_address FROM supporters;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT supporter_name, phone_number, engagement_level FROM supporters WHERE engagement_level > 3;
SELECT supporter_id, campaign_id, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE interaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT supporter_name, city, state, postal_code FROM supporters AS s JOIN addresses AS a ON s.supporter_id = a.supporter_id;
